dcterms:creator: S. Stojanov
A. Thai
J. M. Rehg
dcterms:description: The Toys4k dataset is composed of 4,179 diverse 3-D toy objects distributed in an unbalanced way into 105 categories, designed to match the objects typically encountered by infants.
dcterms:title: Toys4k Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Wang
B. Mayo
D. Deza
A. Barbu
C. Conwell
dcterms:description: The ToyBox dataset contains first-person videos of an observer manipulating 360 objects across 12 categories, focusing on various transformations like translations and rotations.
dcterms:title: ToyBox Dataset

dcterms:creator: V. Lomonaco
D. Maltoni
dcterms:description: The CORe50 dataset comprises 167,866 images of 50 different objects belonging to 10 distinct categories, filmed in various sessions to facilitate continuous object recognition.
dcterms:title: CORe50 Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Gan
J. Schwartz
S. Alter
D. Mrowca
M. Schrimpf
J. Traer
J. De Freitas
J. Kubilius
A. Bhandwaldar
N. Haber
dcterms:description: ThreeDWorld (TDW) is a platform for interactive multi-modal physical simulation, designed to facilitate the study of natural interactions with objects.
dcterms:title: ThreeDWorld (TDW)
